name: @yoonit/nativescript-camera
description: Yoonit Camera have a custom view that shows a preview layer of the front/back camera and detects human faces in it and read qr code.

scripts.tsc: npm i && npm run setup && tsc
scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run build:native
scripts.demo:ios: npm i && cd ../demo-vue && tns run ios
scripts.demo:reset: cd ../demo-vue && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms
scripts.plugin:prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo-vue && tns plugin add ../src && tns plugin remove nativescript-yoonit-camera && npm i && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo:reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules && npm i

author.name: Luigui Delyer, Haroldo Teruya, Victor Goulart & MÃ¡rcio Bruffato @ Cyberlabs AI - 2020
